title: Calories in Polenta
meta_description: Discover calories in polenta per 100 g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition facts for this cornmeal dish.
assumptions: Cooked polenta made from cornmeal and water, no added fat, salt, or dairy.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, cornmeal type, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of cooked polenta contains about 70 kcal, mostly from carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of polenta?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for plain cooked polenta.

faqs.q: Calories in polenta with milk instead of water?
faqs.a: Increases to ~90-100 kcal per 100 g due to added fat and protein.
Yes, traditional polenta from cornmeal is naturally gluten-free.
